phrases: What are you saying?
What is wrong, Norman?
You already know by now, right?
I set a trap for three people.
To Don, I said the rope was under my bed.
To Gilda, I said the second floor bathroom's ceiling.
That is what I told you, Ray.
But actually, I told Don it was in the dining hall, and told Gilda it was in the library.
Then, the rope that was under my bed disappeared.
Then what about the other two locations?
Should we go check on them now?
Dang.
And I thought I was doing so well.
That is right.
I am Mom's spy.
When did you start suspecting me?
The day Sister came to the House.
I was disgusted with myself for thinking such a thing.
You were the first person I suspected.
Even though you are my friend.
I just wished it was not true.
It was my supposition for the worst case.
But for us, it would be the most problematic if you are the traitor.
And from the enemy's point of view, it would be the most beneficial if you are the traitor.
You can give opinions to our plans,
and from the perspective of controlling the situation, it is perfect.
No one else fit the job better.
And that is why you suspected me.
And that is how I walked into your trap, huh?
One more thing.
Ray, you are not a traitor who was set up just for this matter, right?
Mom would never trust a sudden tip or an impromptu spy.
How long have you been Mom's spy?
From a long time ago.
I have been Mom's subordinate for a long time.
Basically, a sheepdog for a shepherd.
You knew about everything and assisted Mom this whole time?
Yeah.
Was everything a lie?
All the time spent preparing for things with Emma and me?
What and how much did you tell Mom?
The tracking devices can be broken, right?
What is the point in asking that?
Depending on the answer, will you cut me off?
I will not.
I will have you by our side, as you have always been.
Are not you glad?
You can continue to hide the mistake you made.
You wanted to keep spying on us, even if it meant framing Don, right?
What do you want?
Three things.
One, continue to spend time with us like before and guarantee our safety.
Two, release all the information you have to us.
Three, come to our side.
Can you become my spy?
You want me to be the ace up your sleeve?
Yeah.
Are you an idiot?
If that was your objective from the beginning, you should have kept quiet and used me.
Just forcibly utilize me and then abandon me when you execute the plan.
That would have been the better method.
You are right, but...
She said we are family that grew up together.
That is why I changed my mind.
I want to believe in you, too.
That you are my friend before my enemy.
Besides, you are the one who hid Little Bunny, right?
That night when we went to the gate, if you had not said that we could make it
we would not have gone.
You led us to discover the truth about this House for ourselves.
You are the one who set up this escape for our sake, right?
Ray, why are you being Mom's sheepdog?
Why?
You would not do things to make us realize the truth if you were 100 percent Mom's dog.
You were controlling us.
The tracking devices, the timing of the escape, and how fast the plan progressed.
That is why you strongly opposed escaping ten days from now.
But at the same time, were not you also keeping Mom under control?
You are not our enemy after all, right?
I volunteered.
I went to her.
No, it is more accurate to say that I sold myself.
It was all in preparation for this escape.
The most efficient way to learn about the enemy and gather things is from inside their pocket.
That is why I brought up a deal to Mom.
That is too dangerous.
I had chances to succeed.
Mom would want to avoid harvesting a top scorer, one she spent time and effort on, midway.
That is how I saw it.
She actually cares more about profit rather than rules.
I basically asked for two things.
One, I will cooperate, so do not immediately ship me out.
Two, I asked for rewards if I gave results.
Rewards?
Just various junk.
If it was not available in the House, I had her obtain it.
I was testing what I could obtain and what was impossible.
I also wanted to probe the outside world.
As a result, she obtained a lot of things, as long as they were not dangerous.
But they were all older models.
Then, when you said you had an idea about breaking the tracking devices...
I have seen the actual device.
I experimented, and after many years, I figured out how to break it.
The tracking devices can definitely be nullified.
Do you understand?
The person you see before you is the strongest card you have.
The tracking devices and Mom.
I have far more information than what is necessary for this escape.
I have been preparing ever since I found out the truth about the House.
Ray.
Without having anyone notice, I had you two go to the gate.
I did all this to make sure you two do not get killed.
Just like you said, I am not your enemy.
But I am also not an ally.
Under one condition, I can completely become your ace.
I will give you all the information I have, and I will also leak lies to Mom like you want.
What is the condition?
Trick Emma.
You need to pretend we are taking everyone, but at the last moment, ditch them.
Even if we take others, it will only be Don and Gilda.
So you are telling me to give up on escaping with everyone?
Yeah.
The training is helping everyone grow more than we expected.
You even said their movement is not bad.
You meant that, right?
Then we can all
It still does not change the fact that they are a burden.
You said you were going to help us.
And this is how I am helping.
Otherwise, you and Emma can die here.
I thought you did not want us to get killed.
If you are just going to get killed as soon as we escape, it would be better to get shipped out.
So?
Will you accept my condition?
Fine.
If what you just said was a lie...
I know.
It was not a lie.
You took a while.
I was talking to Norman.
And?
Nothing much has changed.
They are focused on training with tag.
The bigger issue is that Sister.
She is on the move again.
You should be careful.
I see.
You should have never summoned her.
That was supposed to be a deterrent for me, right?
It makes me sad that you still do not trust me even though I have been helping you for six years.
It is just a precaution.
Besides, if you had made sure those two did not go to the gate that day,
this would not be happening.
I apologized for that.
I never thought you would be a useless dog who could not even keep watch.
I made up for it by spying for you.
I sold out my best friends, and I report Sister Krone's disturbing behavior in detail.
So I am going to get my reward.
Of course.
That is the deal.
With everyone...
Let us escape with everyone!
And of course, with Ray, too!
That is...
That is why I told you.
Emma!
Emma!
Everyone...
Norman, it is morning!
Good morning.
- So then I did this... - Good morning, Norman.
Good morning, Emma.
Good morning, Norman.
I brought the plates.
- Good morning, Ray. - Good morning, Emma.
So?
How did the plan with the ropes go?
Was there progress for the source of information?
Actually...
Oh, that.
It is me.
I am Mom's informant.
It was you?
Sorry for that reaction, but I still do not understand.
Yes!
Let me explain!
So you are the traitor, but not an enemy.
You were acting as Mom's subordinate all this time for our sake?
Yeah.
The truth is, I was going to tell you everything as soon as you got back from the gate.
But you left Little Bunny behind,
saying you wanted to escape with everyone, and other unexpected things happened.
Mom found out, so I had to manage the situation.
Plus you guys were being rash, and about to get reckless.
That is why I figured I should keep quiet and get both under control.
So you are saying that you were covering up for our mistakes.
And you are still against escaping with everyone, right?
But it is different now.
I will help you escape with everyone.
That is not like you.
Do you think he is lying?
No, I am happy.
Ray is now going to help everyone escape.
And we also have information to trick Mom from the inside.
It is awesome!
But, I see.
You knew about everything for a long time, huh?
It must have been painful.
Knowing and sending them off without saying anything.
So many of them.
Hey.
Were the experiments for the tracking devices done on someone is ear?
What happened to that child... or rather, children?
You did not because them to be shipped out early, did you?
You did not sacrifice someone for our sake, did you?
Actually, never mind.
Thank you.
Thanks to that, we can all escape together now.
But...
do not do something like that ever again.
You are not alone anymore.
You are not alone anymore, so...
I swear.
I will never do it again.
Let us all escape from here together.
They are talking on their own again, huh?
Damn it, how long are they going to be discussing things?
We need to go save Conny!
I wonder if there is a reason.
Like what?
I do not know.
It is not just about being dangerous because we are dealing with bad people.
But something even more...
Emma sure was mad.
Hey, Ray.
I want to ask you something.
What?
You said you did it so that both of us do not get killed.
But are you actually...
Oh yeah!
I have something to report.
Gilda and I decided to properly observe Mom once again.
Mom disappears right before eight of the clock every night.
Disappears?
Yeah.
She is nowhere to be found in the House.
This House has a secret room.
A secret room?
Yeah.
Located here.
Next to Mom's bedroom.
Mom's bedroom has the bathroom and washroom next to it.
Past that, continuing beyond the wall is Mom's office.
But this probably is not a wall.
I noticed that every time Mom disappears, she always goes into her office or the washroom.
So I measured the distance inside the room, and the distance in the hallway.
Oh.
That is what you were doing then.
Yeah.
And the result?
They did not match.
There are about ten of my footsteps' worth of space.
One side is a wall, and the other side is a bookshelf.
But I think there are hidden doors on both sides.
And beyond that, there is a secret room.
But what is that for?
Probably
Scheduled check-ins.
Mom does scheduled check-ins to the headquarters every day.
The room is likely for that.
Headquarters?
The base that supplies babies and sisters to this House.
Ray, did you know that there was a room here?
No.
Although I suspected the existence
Let us try to get in.
It is a way to communicate with the outside, and find Conny and the others' whereabouts.
We might be able to find some clues!
But could we get in there so easily?
Even if it is difficult, we have to do it!
Hold on.
There is no merit in going that far.
Even if it is a communication method, it is most likely only connected to headquarters.
And Mom does not know where our siblings were sent.
It is not even an issue of finding clues.
And if we are careless, our tracking devices could give away our position.
We do not know what kind of security that room has.
It is too dangerous.
But...
I am saying that the risk overwhelmingly outweighs the merit.
You are right.
For now, be careful of the Sister.
Do not dig your grave with a foolish move.
Exactly.
I have Mom under control, but we are doomed if the Sister finds out.
Keep that in mind when you act.
Don, can you go ahead to prepare for dinner?
- If someone does not go, Mom will - I know.
Huh?
Don, that way is...
Do you really intend to go in?
I cannot stay calm like them.
And I want to know the real Mom.
There is a hidden door behind here.
How is this set up?
Is there even one here?
Damn it!
I need to hurry and go save her as soon as possible!
Maybe...
Look closely at the shapes.
Let us go.
It is locked.
